#summary Describes Browser-Issues of xssinterface

= Browser Issues of xssinterface =

The new [http://gears.google.com/ Google Gears] backend (currently only available in the svn version) should work in all Browsers that have Google Gears installed.

|| *Browser*   || *OS* || *State* ||
|| Firefox 1.5 || WinXP || verified ||
|| Firefox 2 || OSX 10.4|| verified ||
|| Firefox 2 || WinXP || verified ||
|| Firefox 3 || WinXP || verified (Uses postMessage) ||
|| Opera 9   || WinXP || verified ||
|| Safari    || All except latest nightlies || Only works if all windows are within the same 2nd level domain or you switch to accept all cookies in the preference panel.  ||
|| Safari    || Latest nightlies || Should work (Uses postMessage fallback)  ||
|| IE 6      || WinXP || verified ||
|| IE 7      || All || Basically works, but one needs to either place a [http://www.w3.org/TR/P3P/ P3P Privacy Policy] one the sites or the user needs to allow setting of third-party cookies from the participating domains ||
